Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
Applies one stack of [abilityred]Static Charge[/abilityred] for {StaticTurns}[turn/].
This unit has -{ArcStaticWaveResistance}[DefenseWave/] per stack.[br/]Can stack up to {StackAmount} times.
{StaticChance} strength chance to apply [abilityred]Static Charge[/abilityred] to units for {durationStaticCharge}[turn/].
Stun as in to paralyze or render senseless.
This unit cannot move or use actions.

{StunChance} strength chance to apply [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal for {durationStun}[turn/]. If resisted, apply [abilityred]Static Charge[/abilityred] for {chargeTurns}[turn/] instead.

{InsanityChance}[StrengthPsyche/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Insanity[/abilityred] to non-Mindless units for {durationInsanity}[turn/]. If resisted, apply[abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred] instead.
This unit will attack units at random.
As in left disoriented and in delusion.
{BrokenMindChance}[StrengthPsyche/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred] to non-Mindless for {durationBrokenMind}[turn/]
This unit has -{BrokenMindResistance}[DefensePsyche/] and -{BrokenMindMorale} per stack.[br/]Can stack up to {StackAmount} times.

{CatatonicChance}[StrengthPsyche/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Catatonic[/abilityred] to non-Mindless units for {durationCatatonic}[turn/]. If resisted, apply [abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred] instead.
This unit cannot use any abilities.

{MindControlChance}[StrengthPsyche/] strength chance to [abilityred]Mind Control[/abilityred]. If successful, the unit will come under your control. If resisted, apply [abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred] instead.
"Your" is towards the player. This can be either male or female.
This unit has been Mind Controlled.
{PanicChance}[StrengthPsyche/] strength chance to [abilityred]Panic[/abilityred] to non-Mindless for {durationPanic}[turn/].
{PanicChance}[StrengthPsyche/] strength chance to [abilityred]Panic[/abilityred] to non-Mindless for {durationPanic}[turn/]. If resisted, apply [abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred] instead.
{PanicChance}[StrengthPsyche/] strength chance to [abilityred]Panic[/abilityred] to non-Mindless for {durationPanic}[turn/]. If resisted, apply [abilityred]Stagger[/abilityred] instead.
This unit is fleeing and is uncontrollable.

{ConcussionChance}[StrengthPhysical/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Concussion[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal or non-Mechanical for {durartionConcussion}[turn/]. If resisted, cause [abilityred]Massive Impact[/abilityred] instead.
{ConcussionChance}[StrengthPhysical/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Concussion[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal or non-Mechanical for {durartionConcussion}[turn/].
This unit cannot use actions or movement.
{BleedingChance}[StrengthPhysical/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Bleeding[/abilityred] to Biological or Cyborg targets for {durationBleeding}[turn/]
This unit is Bleeding, it has -{KineticResistanceDown}[damagePhysical/] resistance and is taking {BleedingDamage}[damagephysical/] damage every [turn/]
{ShieldOverheatChance}[StrengthThermal/] to apply [abilityred]Shield Overheat[/abilityred] until end of combat.
{BurningChance}[StrengthThermal/] strength chance to apply [abilityRed]Burning[/abilityRed] to non-Ethereal and non-Mineral targets for {durationBurning}[turn/].
This unit is taking {BurningDamage} per [turn/] and is {EvasionReduction}% easier to hit.
{BlindChance}[StrengthPhysical/] strength chance to apply [abilityRed]Blinded[/abilityRed] to non-Ethereal targets for {durationBlind}[turn/].
This unit's accuracy is reduced by {BlindAccuracyReduce} and it cannot use Overwatch.
{CharredChance}[StrengthThermal/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Charred[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal, non-Mineral and non-Mechanical targets for {durationIrradiation}[turn/].
{ImmolateChance}[StrengthThermal/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Immolated[/abilityred] to non-Mineral or non-Ethereal targets for {durationImmolated}[turn/].
This unit is taking {ImmolateDamage}[thermal/] damage per [turn/] and is {EvasionReduction}% easier to hit.
{PoisonChance}[StrengthBio/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Poison[/abilityred] to Biological or Cyborg targets for {durationPoison}[turn/]
The unit is taking {PoisonDamage} per [turn/] and has -{NegativeMorale}[anger/].
{SlowChance}[StrengthPhysical/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Slow[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal units for {durationSlow}[turn/]
This unit's movement points are reduced to the [abilityred]Slowest[/abilityred] movement speed, with 16[movewalk/] and 1 hex to sprint.
{DebilitatingChance}[StrengthBio/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Debilitating Infection[/abilityred] to Biological and Cyborg targets for {durationDebilitating}[turn/]
This unit is {DebilitatingAccuracyDebuff}% easier to hit and has {DebilitatingMoraleDebuff}
{ParasiticChance}[StrengthBio/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Parasitic Infection[/abilityred] to Biological and Cyborg units until the end of combat.

This unit has {ParasiticMoraleDebuff} and -{ParasiticBioResistance} damage resistance.[br/]After combat, this unit may turn into a Xenoplague unit if the one who infected it has the appropriate Xenoplague technology unlocked.
{BlightedChance}[StrengthBio/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Blighted[/abilityred] to Biological and Cyborg targets for {durationBlight}[turn/]
This unit has -{BlightedMoralePenalty}, -{BlightedAccuracyReduction}% accuracy to hit with attacks and takes {BlightedDamagePerTurn}[DamageBio/] per [turn/]
{DemolisherDamage} additional damage to obstacles. Can destroy fortified obstacles.
This unit is able to move through and destroy obstacles, although it is slowed down. This does not apply to fortified obstacles.
This unit is able to move through and destroy obstacles. This does not apply to fortified obstacles. The unit is not slowed by this.
Overwatch is a game mechanic that allows units to go into a sort of Guard Mode, where they automatically shoot any enemy who comes into view.
This unit can enter Superior Overwatch, allowing it to automatically shoot at an enemy that moves or attacks within its field of view for {SuperiorOverwatch} damage.
Overwatch is a game mechanic that allows units to go into a sort of Guard Mode, where they automatically shoot any enemy who comes into view.
When this unit enters Overwatch, it is always considered to have full action points, regardless of how many it actually has.
Overwatch is a game mechanic that allows units to go into a sort of Guard Mode, where they automatically shoot any enemy who comes into view.
This unit can enter Improved Overwatch, allowing it to automatically shoot at an enemy that moves or attacks within its field of view with {ImprovedOverwatchAccuracy} accuracy while in Overwatch.
Melee attacks will deal {damage} increased damage if the unit moved at least {ChargeHexes} hexes before attacking.
{damage} damage if this unit moves at least {ChargeHexes} hexes
The unit cannot move, but can still perform actions.
This unit is {ObscuredAccuracyTarget} harder to hit.
This unit is {LightObscuredAccuracyTarget} harder to hit.
This unit is {TargetedAccuracyPenalty} easier to hit.
Flanking attacks against this unit will ignore up to {ExposedArmorIgnore}
Units take {SuperheatHazardDamage} when moving through or ending their turn on this hex.
Units moving through or ending their turn in this cloud take {GasDamage} damage.
Units on this hex are {TallgrassAccuracyBonus} harder to hit. Large Target units do not benefit.
Units ending their turn on this hex are healed for {HealingHazard}[hp/].
Quartzite refers to the mineral based independent unit.
This obstacle explodes when destroyed, dealing {QuartziteCrystalDamage} damage to adjacent non-Mineral units, and healing Mineral units for {QuartziteCrystalHealing}.
Quartzite refers to the mineral based independent unit.
Non-Mineral units take {NaniteHazardDamage} when moving through or ending their turn on this hex.
Units on this hex are {SmokescreenAccuracyBonus} harder to hit.
Units suffer {BurnGroundDamage} when moving through or ending their turn on this hex.
{BurningChance}[StrengthThermal/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Burning[/abilityred] for {BurningDuration}[turn/] to units moving through or ending their turn on this hex.
Units moving through or ending their turn in the grinder take {Kinetic}.
Units take {NaniteHazardDamage} when moving through or ending their turn on this hex.
Deals {NaniteCloudDamage} to units moving through or ending their turn in this cloud.

Deals {ToxinCloudDamage}[DamageBio/] and has a {DebilitatingInfectionChance}[StrengthBio/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Debilitating Infection[/abilityred] for {DebilitatingInfectionDuration}[turn/] to Biological and Cyborg units moving through or ending their turn in this cloud.
{StasisChance}[strengthphysical/] strength chance to remove {stasisremoveap} action point.

{PosionChance}[StrengthBio/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Poisoned[/abilityred] for {PoisonDuration}[turn/] to non-Beetle Biological and Cyborg units moving through or ending their turn on this hex.

{ElectrifyChance}[StrengthWave/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Electrified[/abilityred] for {ElectrifyDuration}[turn/] to non-Beetle and non-Ethereal units moving through or ending their turn on this hex.
{EncaseChance}[StrengthBio/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Encase[/abilityred] for {EncaseDuration}[turn/]. If resisted, this ability causes [abilityred]Stagger[/abilityred] instead.
This unit cannot use actions or movement.
[abilityred]Stagger[/abilityred] units, reducing action points and canceling defense modes.
[abilityred]Stagger[/abilityred] units, including stagger resistant units, reducing action points and canceling defense modes.
Units take {SpillDamage}[DamageBio/] and lose 1 [armor/] when moving through or ending their turn on this hex.
Units on this hex are {MistAccruacyDebuff}% harder to hit.
Units ending their turn on this hex take {WhirlpoolDamage} and become [abilityred]Slow[/abilityred].
Units ending their turn on this hex are {obscuredHitRate}% harder to hit and heal {healAmount}[hp/]
Units ending their turn on these hexes are {obscuredHitRate}% harder to hit and heal {healAmount}[hp/]

Units take {staticDamage}[DamageWave/], and all non-Ethereal units have a {StunChance}[StrengthWave/]) strength chance to get [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred] for {StunDuration}[turn/] when moving through or ending their turn on this hex.
{ElectrifiedChance}[StrengthWave/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Electrified[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal for {ElectrifiedDuration}[turn/].
This unit is taking {ElectrifiedDamage} every [turn/] and its attacks have -{AccuracyPenalty}% accuracy.
{EntangledChance}[StrengthPhysical/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Entangled[/abilityred] to landbound non-Ethereal units for {durationEntangled}[turn/].
The unit cannot move, but can still perform actions.
This unit has {TurbulencePenalty}% less accuracy and slow movement speed.
{TurbulenceChance} strength chance to apply [abilityred]Turbulence[/abilityred] to Flying, non-Ethereal units for {TurbulenceTurns}
Units moving through or ending their turn on this hex have {BlindChance} strength chance to become [abilityred]Blinded[/abilityred].
This unit has {ChokingAccuracy} accuracy and deals {ChokingDamage} damage.
{ChokingChance} strength chance to apply [abilityred]Choking[/abilityred] to Biological or Cyborg units for {durationChoking}[turn/].
Biological and Cyborg units moving through or ending their turn on this hex start [abilityred]Choking[/abilityred].
Will explode when destroyed, dealing {ExplosiveDamage} in a {EffectRadius} hex radius.
When reduced to 0 this obstacle will start burning. This will damage itself until it is destroyed, which will cause it to explode.
This obstacle will take {UnstableExplosiveDamage} damage at the start of each turn, exploding when destroyed dealing {ExplosionDamage} to adjacent units and obstacles.
PyrX is the gas used by the Prometean secret tech, see Glossary for details.
After {Timer}[turn/], this cloud explodes, dealing {ExplDamage} damage with [abilityred]Massive Impact[/abilityred].
This unit can enter Overwatch, allowing it to automatically fire at any enemy that moves or attacks within its field of view.
Overwatch is a game mechanic that allows units to go into a sort of Guard Mode, where they automatically shoot any enemy who comes into view.
Attacks will [abilityred]Stagger[/abilityred] any units that are not resistant and Mechanical.
Attacks will [abilityred]Stagger[/abilityred] any units that are not immune and Mechanical.
{bonus} additional damage for each hex moved (maximum {maxNumStacks})
This unit is {IlluminatedHit} easier to hit.
{KnockbackChance} chance to [abilityred]knock back[/abilityred] a non-Ethereal, non-Heavy enemy unit {KnockbackDistance} hex.
{HallucinateChance} strength chance to apply [abilityred]Hallucinating[/abilityred] to non-Mindless Biological and Cyborg units for {HallucinateDuration}[turn/]
This unit is currently always considered flanked and has {HallucinatingAccuracyLoss} accuracy.
{CrippleChance}[StrengthPhysical/] strength chance to apply [abilityRed]Crippled[/abilityRed] to Biological and Cyborg targets for {CrippleDuration}[turn/].
On flanking attacks: {CrippleChance}[StrengthPhysical/] strength chance to apply [abilityRed]Crippled[/abilityRed] to Biological and Cyborg targets for {CrippleDuration}[turn/].
This unit has reduced movement and -{CrippleAccuracy} accuracy
This unit is travelling on a water transport and is more vulnerable to attack. It has -{embarkedWeakness} resistance to all damage and cannot use cover.
This unit is being upgraded with new modifications, reducing its combat efficiency. It deals {damageReduction} less damage, and none of its modifications currently work.
Upgrading this unit will disable its mods and cause it to deal less damage for {duration}
This unit's mods are disabled as it is upgrading
This unit is a turret and will automatically target units according to its parameters
Units moving through or ending their turn on this hex take damage and lose {ArmorReduction}

{MadnessChance}[StrengthPsyche/] strength chance to apply either [abilityred]Catatonic[/abilityred], [abilityred]Insanity[/abilityred] or [abilityred]Panic[/abilityred] to non-Mindless units for {MadTime}[turn/]. If resisted, apply [abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred] instead.
Entangled by vines made of a dark energy.
{EntangledChance}[StrengthPsyche/] to apply [abilityred]Entangled[/abilityred] to landbound units for {durationEntangled}[turn/]
The unit cannot move, but can still perform actions
Cosmite Tear/Piece is an hazardous object found in combat that when destroyed explodes and deals damage to nearby units. Tear as in ripping apart.

When destroyed, 4[StrengthPhysical/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Dimensional Instability[/abilityred] to each unit within 2 hexes of this obstacle. In addition, it leaves an Abyss hole behind on the hex it previously occupied.

When destroyed, 8[StrengthPhysical/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Dimensional Instability[/abilityred] to each unit within 8 hexes of this obstacle. In addition, it leaves behind an Abyss hole on the hex it previously occupied.
When destroyed, 4[StrengthPhysical/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Dimensional Instability[/abilityred] to every unit within 2 hexes of this obstacle.
When destroyed, 8[StrengthPhysical/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Dimensional Instability[/abilityred] to every unit within 8 hexes of this obstacle.

{PsiImmmobilizeChance}[StrengthPsyche/] strength chance to apply [abilityRed]Immobilize[/abilityRed] to non-Mindless targets for {PsiImmobilizeDuration}[turn/]. If resisted, apply [abilityred]Slow[/abilityred] instead.
{ImmobilizeChance}[StrengthBio/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Immobilized[/abilityred] to [abilityred]Slowed[/abilityred] units for {durationImmobilize}[turn/]
{SlowChance}[StrengthBio/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Slow[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal units for {durationSlow}[turn/]
Non-floating units take {ArcHazardDamage} when moving through or ending their turn on this hex.
Unit gains +10% damage for each stack of [essencecharge/].[br/]Stacks up to {INT_max} times.
{PoisonChance}[StrengthBio/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Neural Toxin[/abilityred] to Biological or Cyborg targets for {durationPoison}[turn/].
This unit has {ToxinChance}[strengthBio/] of becoming [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred] at the start of each turn. If resisted, deals {DamageAmount}[damageBio/] damage instead.
Stunend as in the status condition
